page.title: 07VILLAGE GROUPS
page.content: In Tackley we have a{Peace Group.} They meet at 6.15 p.m. Whatever the age you can go and join them. On Thursdays they all come together and think of peace - generally about Upper Heyford (an American Air Force base about 5 miles away) and nuclear war. They meet on the village green and stay for a quarter of an hour. The{Women's Institute}holds monthly meetings. The April meeting was held at Wesley-Barrell, Witney. The minutes were read in the comfort of the showroom. We were then given a tour of the factory and were able to see the making of mattresses from start to finish. The{Toddler Group}meets in the Village Hall on Tuesdays and is for children under 3 and their mums. The children paint, draw and play. In summer they go on local outings.
